title: Nola Rain
description: Nola Rain’s life is soon to be forever changed. She loses her husband in a tragic mining accident and is left alone and pregnant with their son. Just as she is dealing with the loss of Milo, her husband, she is slapped with further devastation and life altering news. In this tale of love, romance, and adventure, Nola Rain goes from rags to riches and must survive and adapt to the world of privilege that her husband left behind — and she knew nothing about it! As Nola is learning and discovering all about the secrets her husband left in his past, someone is trying to catch up with Nola’s present, and possibly her future. If she isn’t careful, this sinister character may try to take away all that Nola has recently acquired. And this someone will stop at nothing to get it.
author: Lynda C Yeates
